casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
William Thomas BAUBERGER. No. 172A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2006. Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Isaac T. Avery, III, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

The Motion to Consider Supplemental Response of defendant William Thomas Bauberger is allowed. The State is allowed five (5) days from the date of this order to file a response, should it so desire.

By order of the Court in conference, this 1st day of December, 2006.
